Heroes of Pymoli Observations:

Three Observable Trends:

1) Majority of the current player base are Male, accounting for 84% of the player base, with female & undisclosed accounting for 16% of the player base. 

2) Female and Other Gender groups tend to have fewer purchase frequencies than Men with a combined frequency of 128 purchases, but pay higher average prices for their games ($3.23 & $3.35 respectively). 

3) 1/3rd of our player base are in the age range 21 - 25 years old, and over 1/2th of the player base are within the age range 17 - 25, accounting for 59% of the total player base.
